ref: 8615 *pratiskhalana ʻ deviation, obstruction ʼ. [pratiskhal- ita -- ʻ warded off ʼ Śiś. -- √skhal]
Pk. paḍikkhalaṇa -- n. ʻ falling, obstacle ʼ, paḍikkhalaï ʻ falls, gets out of the way, is stopped ʼ, tr. ʻ stops ʼ;

M. paḍkhaḷaṇ n. ʻ light copper ring worn in an ear just bored (to ward off misfortune?) ʼ.
